directions: Mix together creamed corn, whole kernel corn, and uncooked macaroni. Slice the butter or margarine, and mix into the corn mixture along with the cheese.  Place in a buttered casserole dish.  Cover.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 30 minutes.  Uncover, stir, and bake uncovered for 30 more minutes.
title: Lucy's Mac and Corn
